provenance: Albert W. Blum (1882-1952); [Elizabeth Hamilton/Jeffrey Wortman, New York; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ornament with Cuirass and Two Genii, From Four Ornaments, Plate 4
